Description.UIName: Contract for Alacorn VI Tank Airdrop
Description.Name: Contract for Alacorn VI Tank Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your friendship with ComStar, they have offered you a contract with one of their tank crews. Purchasing this contract will permit the one-time option to field an Alacorn VI using a Tank Airdrop. After use, the contract is void and the Alacorn VI can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
